name: Compass
description: A navigational tool used to find the way through the maze.

name: Life Token
description: Grants an extra life when collected.
action: You obtain a life and feel relief

name: Battle Axe
description: A heavy weapon found in the Armory Room, used for powerful attacks.
action: You strike the enemy and feel the power

name: Magical Sword
description: A rare and powerful sword found in the Magical Sword Room. Its magical properties give it special abilities in combat.
action: You strike the enemy and feel the power
